data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Osasuna throw-in in Alaves's half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Alaves.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Osasuna.
Alaves push forward at Estadio El Sadar and Deyverson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Osasuna defence.
In the minute 2, Santiago Jaime Latre awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Osasuna's half?
Osasuna are whistled for offside.
In the minute 7, So close for Osasuna as Ante Budimir's shot comes back off the post.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Alaves a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Alaves!
In the minute 8, Ruben Martinez (Osasuna) sees red and is sent off in Pamplona!
Deyverson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Deyverson returns to the field for Alaves after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 13, Sergio Herrera is replacing Ante Budimir for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
Important block from the Osasuna defence as Joselu fires in a strike for Alaves.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
Free kick Osasuna.
In Pamplona, Alaves push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 17, Osasuna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Osasuna in the half of Alaves.
Throw-in for Osasuna in their own half.
In the minute 20, Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
Osasuna have a dangerous throw-in.
Osasuna have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, In Pamplona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio El Sadar.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pamplona.
In the minute 29, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Alaves.
Alaves's Deyverson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Osasuna defender.
Osasuna have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 31, Osasuna attack but Aridane's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio El Sadar.
Throw-in for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
In the minute 32, Osasuna's Ruben Garcia is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Alaves capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Pamplona, Edgar Mendez of Alaves is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio El Sadar.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Alaves a goal kick.
Throw-in for Osasuna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Osasuna in the half of Alaves.
Tomas Pina is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
Osasuna needs to be cautious. Alaves have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Osasuna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Deyverson (Alaves) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 41, Jonathan Calleri (Osasuna) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
Joselu (Alaves) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
Alaves to take a throw-in in Osasuna territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Osasuna in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In Pamplona Osasuna attack through Jon Moncayola. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Alaves have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Osasuna.
In the minute 45, Ruben Garcia hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Pamplona for Osasuna.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Enric Gallego is on a sub for Jonathan Calleri for Osasuna.
Pablo Machin (Alaves) is making a first substitution, with Lucas Perez replacing Deyverson.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pamplona.
In the minute 47, Osasuna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Pamplona, Luis Rioja of Alaves is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Osasuna's half?
In the minute 50, Throw-in Osasuna.
Osasuna are caught offside.
Osasuna's Jon Moncayola gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio El Sadar.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Alaves.
Alaves are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 55, In Pamplona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Florian Lejeune (Alaves) gets a yellow card.
Enric Gallego (Osasuna) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Alaves defenders.
In the minute 57, Joselu for Alaves gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Osasuna have a goal kick.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Osasuna's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 60, Santiago Jaime Latre awards Osasuna a goal kick.
Osasuna have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Osasuna to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Alaves throw-in in Osasuna's half.
In the minute 64, At Estadio El Sadar, Sergio Herrera has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Alaves.
Throw-in for Osasuna in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 66, Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Edgar Mendez with Borja Sainz.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roberto Torres scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio El Sadar.
In the minute 67, Enric Gallego with an assist there.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
In the minute 73, Oier for Osasuna has been booked by Santiago Jaime Latre and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Alaves have been given a penalty at Estadio El Sadar...
Goal! The away team is awarded a penalty in Pamplona. Lucas Perez converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Tomas Pina with Jota. This is the third substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
Tomas Tavares is replacing Ximo Navarro for the away team.
Free kick Alaves.
In the minute 78, Jota (Alaves) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 78, Jota (Alaves) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pamplona.
Throw-in Osasuna.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Alaves in Pamplona.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Osasuna's area.
Osasuna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Jota (Alaves) has received a yellow card from Santiago Jaime Latre.
Corner awarded to Osasuna.
Osasuna have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Osasuna's half?
Alaves drive upfield and Joselu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Osasuna defender.
In the minute 86, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Alaves throw-in in Osasuna's half.
Corner awarded to Osasuna.
Osasuna surge into the attack at Estadio El Sadar but David Garciaâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 89, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pamplona.
Goal kick for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Alaves's Lucas Perez misses with an attempt on goal.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Osasuna a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Pamplona. The final score is 1-1.
Osasuna make their third substitution with Enrique Barja replacing Ruben Garcia.
Jagoba Arrasate is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio El Sadar with Jony replacing Roberto Torres.
Javier Martinez Calvo is replacing Jon Moncayola for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
